subject: Google Virtual Onsite Interview - Software Engineering Intern
body_text:
Hi,

Congratulations on passing your phone interview! We were impressed with your performance and would like to invite you to a Virtual Onsite Technical Interview for the Software Engineering Intern position.

Interview Details:
- Format: Virtual Onsite (Google Meet)
- Duration: 3-4 hours (3 technical rounds + 1 behavioral)
- Date Options: January 15, 16, or 17, 2025

Each technical round will be 45 minutes and will focus on:
1. Coding and algorithms
2. System design basics
3. Technical problem solving

Please use the scheduling link below to select your preferred date and time:
https://calendar.google.com/schedule/onsite123

To prepare, we recommend:
- Practice coding problems on LeetCode
- Review data structures and algorithms
- Be ready to explain your thought process

Please confirm your interview slot within 5 business days.

Best regards,
Sarah Chen
Google University Recruiting
body_html:
